channel.title: Addin d claws

item.title: Addin d claws
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Hi im usin a tut and it said search for public void process() { in client.java and add this below

f ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { setAnimation(2068) } SpecDamgNPC(30); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } } if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { setAnimation(2068) } SpecDamg(25); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } }

But the thing is i searched for it and it couldnt find itâ€¦ could anyone tell me what to do plz?

Read full topic
